Html:
The cut, copy and paste functions are not working for me  (FF, Safari, Chrome, all on Mac) . The execCommand is actually supposed to have a couple other parameters for those functions, which I put in, but it still doesn't work. Any ideas anyone?

 

<!-- p.p1 {margin: 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px 0.0px; font: 11.0px Menlo} span.s1 {color: #b4280d} span.s2 {color: #9237bd} -->

cut: function() {          

this.ec("cut", "false", "null");

        },

 copy: function() {

            this.ec("copy", "false", "null");

        },

paste: function() {

            this.ec("paste", "false", "null");

        }

 

Thanks,

Kyle
